main event: A 10-year-old observer reported seeing a red and white blinking light in the sky on December 30, 1968, in Havertown, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The observer did not believe the object was a plane,The blinking light was described as moving and then appearing to catch on fire,The observer filed the report due to a fear of the unknown,The sighting was filed as INSUFFICIENT DATA for evaluation,The Air Force requested additional details for scientific investigation.
sighted object: red and white blinking light in the sky
